title: authors
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: Amy Kendig, Christopher Wojan, Penny Reif

title: location
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: Big Oaks National Wildlife Refuge, Madison, IN, USA

title: plot
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: experimental plot, which corresponds to planting treatment (1 - 10)

title: sp
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: species (Ev = Elymus virginicus, Mv = Microstegium vimineum)

title: ID
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: plant ID (A = focal adult, 1 - 3 = focal seedlings, other = background)

title: leaves_tot
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: number of leaves on a tiller

title: leaves_infec
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: number of leaves with at least two lesions on that same tiller

title: Bp_spots_Ev
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not Elymus individuals appeared to have Bipolaris infection (leopard-like spots)

title: seeds_collected
ev_disease_seeds_sep_2018_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not seeds were collected
